title: Final schedule set
message: The final schedule for all our fantastic speakers is ready. It will be great!

title: Keynote speakers page
message: Added a keynote speakers page with a short introduction of our speakers.

title: Schedule updated
message: The Schedule is now updated and more or less as it will be on the day for the conference.

title: Google will speak at CTS 2022
message: Google will join CTS 2022! They have promised an inspirational talk about artificial intelligence and machine learning on Google Cloud.

title: Keynote speaker is set

title: Speakers updated
message: The list of speakers is updated. The schedule is still a work in progress.
